column4: i dont understand this nomenclature?  does this mean that is it essentially a shortcut? (maintenance -> /usr/share/mediawiki1.7/maintenance) how do i edit/change it?
i typed "ls -l" and it shows this..."maintenance -> /usr/share/mediawiki1.7/maintenance".  is it just a shortcut? how do i change it?
should i use my powers of invisibility for good... or evil? =)
